title: Minecraft 携带版 Alpha 0.12.1 build8 已发布
author: 广药
txt_content:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/11tUgbssVOAwT0xD1_sB_CJV3Ugl4hZSdVDBbFwayxXA/pub 需翻墙

Tweaks
-Explosion are more explodey!
-Lots of fixes and tweaks in the control layout screen
-Nametags are visible from farther away now
-Hitting your head on the ceiling gives a slight jump delay
-Ghasts hitboxes are bigger
-Experience orbs are burned by lava or fire
-Beetroots are found in Villages rather than by tilling grass
Bug Fixes
-The input is smoother and more responsive, especially scrolling panes
-Touching the d-pad or the toolbar doesn't select the blocks under the button anymore!
-Enchanting tables work better in multiplayer!
-The sneaking button now works properly
-Bottles don't disappear anymore when pulled out of a Brewing Stand
-Controllers are properly recognized if they are already connected on game start
-Mobs don't jump on Soul Sand anymore
-Skins now refresh when returning to the Skin Selection screen
-Fixed some Taiwanese and Japanese characters being shared with Chinese
-Invert Y-axis now actually works on Controller
-Fixed a random multiplayer crash
-Can now jump while holding the Forward button
-Can now select the player list in the game menu using the D-pad
-Sittings dogs won't be suffocated under accumulating snow (yay!)
-The Experience bar doesn't overflow the toolbar anymore
-Fixed wrong double chest name
-All enchantments show their level now
-Android clients don't receive trial warnings anymore
-Lava now prevents fall damag

◎修改
-爆炸更加剧烈
-在操作布局界面进行的大量修正和修改
-用户标签现在可以在很远的地方被看见
-将你的头撞到天花板会造成略微的跳跃延迟
-恶魂的碰撞箱更大了
-经验球会被岩浆或火烧掉
-甜菜可以在村庄被找到而不是通过犁地
◎漏洞修复
-操作更加流畅和敏感，尤其是物品滚动栏
-点击方向键或物品栏不再会选定该按键下方的方块了！
-在多人游戏中附魔台能更好地工作！
-潜行键现在正确工作
-水瓶取出酿造台时不再会消失了
-如果在游戏开始界面连接手柄，它将能够被更好地识别
-生物不再能够在灵魂沙上跳起
-现在转换到皮肤选择界面时，皮肤会刷新
-修复了一些繁体中文和日语中与简体中文相同的文字有关的问题
-在使用手柄时，颠倒Y轴选项能够正常工作
-修复了一个随机多人游戏崩溃问题
-现在按住后退键也可以跳跃
-现在可以在游戏菜单中使用方向键选择玩家列表
-现在坐着的狗不会被累积的雪闷死
-经验条不再超出物品栏
-修复了错误的大箱子名称
-现在所有附魔物品显示它们的附魔等级
-安卓客户端不再会显示“尝试警告”了
-岩浆现在避免摔落伤害

附上地址：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1bnHe7aZ
